title: Strike workers of the Coops. Social - From the workers Slai cobas sc Palermo: No increases in alms, No discrimination
content:
The workers and precarious workers of the social coops of the Slai Cobas Sc of Palermo will be in the assembly on the national strike day of April 10, in connection with all the workers and workers in the sector in mobilization, the struggle does not stop!

Against the CCNL signed by the confederals by "increases" alms of wages compared to the increase in prices and to the caravan, from the denial of the arrears, of more exploitation of discrimination towards the workers mothers ...
We want a stable job, no more precariousness! The service of hygiene-specialized personnel must be guaranteed for all disabled high school students who are entitled to it from the beginning and throughout the school year, has a program already been prepared by the Metropolitan City, also with the Sicilian Region, for the next school year to avoid the long-standing problems of resources and time that recur every year?
The request to the families of the disabled students of the UVM certification as a prerequisite to provide the assistance service in question is not legitimate, creates discrimination and must be abolished
The right to work must be guaranteed to all the personnel assistants specialized in the basin, without any discrimination towards women's assistants, by majority in the sector, which must not be penalized and excluded from work, as already seriously successful, for an alleged and non -alleged and not legitimate "such question" which if applied in a way do not appropriate de facto discriminating women on the one hand and on the other for the action of non -transparent social cooperatives and not in line with the provisions of current and not sufficiently controlled legislation
The principle of user continuity/operator/operator must be fully guaranteed without implementing, as seriously successful this year, not legitimate mergers of users or non -transparent assignments to social coops without respecting the choices of families at all, only in the perspective of save resources and cut jobs by the contracting authority, metropolitan city
The weekly hours of service, which are absolutely not sufficient to date, must be increased to ensure a service of full quality and safety
It is our right to have the coverage of the working days, in the event of prolonged absence of the pupil/disabled pupil, or of the assemblies of the institute or suspensions of educational activities, with the economic coverage for the first two/three days in case of absence of the 'pupil and the method of recovering the hours not completed for the following days of absence, or for the suspension days
the replacement of the Assistant who must accompany the disabled student on trips must be ensured, while eliminating the current procedures that in fact generate discrimination for the students in question
Best health and safety in the work conditions must be guaranteed
Enough money from the government Meloni Meloni for the war but for services, school, health care!
Slai Cobas Sc Palermo via M. Cipolla 93
